section.p: <p>"Identifies the co-existing agent contributing to the DUR event (drug or disease) conflicting with the prescribed drug." - NCPDP Script (Field 7883, Data Dictionary 201009)</p>

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] code with data type Code
